page.title: 02Shobdon and Byton 1985
page.content:
In 1985 the primary school in Shobdon did a survey based on the results of 78 questionnaires for the {Domesday Project. For the survey each of the 24 pupils of Class 2 interviewed one adult member of their family and then a number of neighbours or friends of the family living in the area. The survey results therefore do not necessarily reflect a true cross section of the population of the area. The sections of the pupils' questionnaire were as follows;
1 {Homes 2{ Family 3 {Possessions 4 {Work 5 {Leisure 6 {Holidays 7 {Shopping
